main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a UFO on August 28, 1968, in Athens, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The observed object was reportedly moving east to west., The report included a questionnaire to gather detailed information about the sighting., The observer noted it was a disc-shaped object with silvery blue color and one red-orange light., The sighting was reported to the Air Force for further investigation.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with silvery blue color and one red-orange light
